title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 18.6 - Applicability of mental hygiene law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 18.6 - Applicability of mental hygiene law

State Regulations

The admission and retention of the prisoner in a hospital
shall be subject to the provisions of articles 29 and 31 of the Mental Hygiene

Law, including, but not limited to, the confirmation of need for admission, notice, hearing, review and judicial approval of continued retention and notice
to and access to the Mental Health Information Service. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
18.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
